StringLiteralExpr.value: nrows must be a whole number scalar
ncols must be a whole number scalar
nrows and ncols must be greater than, or equal to, 1.
offset should be a four-element numeric vector
offset should not contain any negative values
scale should be a two-element numeric vector
scale values should be in the range [0,1]
subfigrid: Since there is only one column, scale(1) has no effect (and is consequently set to 1).
subfigrid: Since there is only one row, scale(2) has no effect (and is consequently set to 1).
